name: The Thinking City
description:
The thinking city is a first person survival/horror game where the player descends into an underground, technologically advanced city. The city itself is devoid of all human life and its A.I robots continue to carry out their functions. The player must make their way through the city with the help of an A.I character called T.H.R.I.S.H in an attempt to escape. Along the way the player will uncover the horrible fate of the cities residents.

The section of our game we are developing has the player navigating an old lab, avoiding a hostile robot in order to escape the facility.

Any and all comments/feedback would be greatly appreciated as this is my teams final year project in college and we are really looking for as much feedback as possible. 

This game was built using the oculus rift and works on some other VR sets but we have'nt tested them all.

If for any reason you can't play the game then please feel free to check out the trailer and tell us what you think :)

NOTE: Steam VR is needed to play.
